NIRA is a new fintech business seeking to address the issue of access to credit for consumers in India. With banks relying predominantly on CIBIL scores and collateral pledged against loans, less than 10% of Indians are able to get loans through the formal sector. Thus, most people are forced to use informal channels when they need finance. 
 
 In todays digital age, users are creating large amounts of information about themselves through their activity on their smartphones and online. By combining these news types of data with traditional sources used to assess borrowers (bank statement etc.) we can now score these previously unscored borrowers. If a borrowers score is sufficiently high on our proprietary model, we can offer them credit. 
 
 We are reimagining the way loans are underwritten and bring access to credit to millions of underbanked in India. We can economically empower them to have greater control of their lives and provide downside protection in difficult times. We are addressing head-on a big challenge. Its also a great opportunity from both a commercial and societal impact perspective.
